mapper.insert: insert into tbl_todolist(tdno, fk_mbr_seq, subject, contents, deadline) values(seq_todolist_tdno.nextval, to_number(#{fk_mbr_seq}), #{subject}, #{contents}, to_date(#{deadline}))
mapper.select: select tdno, fk_mbr_seq, subject, contents, important, fk_statno , to_char(registerday, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as registerday , to_char(deadline, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as deadline from tbl_todolist where fk_mbr_seq = #{fk_mbr_seq}

select tdno, fk_mbr_seq, subject, contents, important, fk_statno , to_char(registerday, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as registerday , to_char(deadline, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as deadline from tbl_todolist where tdno = #{tdno} and fk_mbr_seq = #{fk_mbr_seq}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_workmanage(wmno, fk_wtno, fk_requester_seq, fk_receiver_seq, subject, contents, deadline, fk_statno) values (seq_workmanage_wmno.nextval, #{fk_wtno}, #{fk_requester_seq}, #{fk_receiver_seq}, #{subject}, #{contents}, to_date(#{deadline}), #{fk_statno})
mapper.select: select wmno, fk_wtno, fk_requester_seq, fk_receiver_seq, subject, fk_statno , to_char(registerday, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as registerday , to_char(deadline, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as deadline from tbl_workmanage where fk_wtno = #{workType} and fk_requester_seq = #{userId} fk_receiver_seq = #{userId}

select wmno, fk_wtno, fk_requester_seq, fk_receiver_seq, subject, fk_statno , to_char(registerday, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as registerday , to_char(deadline, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as deadline from tbl_workmanage where fk_wtno = #{workType} and wmno in ( select fk_wmno from tbl_wmrefer where fk_referrer_seq = #{userId} )
